description: Schema for submitting an antibody lot (not including target or characterization information).
title: Antibody lot

___control_type.description: The specific type of control if the experiment is a control.
___control_type.title: Control type

items.description: The name of the gene whose expression or product is the intended goal of the antibody.

___lot_id_alias.description: The lot identifiers for this lot deemed to be exactly the same by the vendor.
___lot_id_alias.title: Lot ID aliases

items.description: The lot identifier for this lot deemed to be exactly the same by the vendor.
items.title: Lot ID Alias

___lot_id.description: The lot identifier provided by the originating lab or vendor.
___lot_id.title: Lot ID

___dbxrefs.description: Identifiers from external resources that may have 1-to-1 or 1-to-many relationships with ENCODE objects.
___dbxrefs.title: External resources

items.description: Identifier from an external resource that may have 1-to-1 or 1-to-many relationships with ENCODE objects.
items.title: External identifier

___clonality.description: The diversification of the immune cell lineage to make the antibody.
___clonality.title: Clonality

___isotype.description: The class of antibody ( e.g. IgA, IgD, IgE, IgG or IgM)
___isotype.title: Isotype

___host_organism.description: The organism the antibody was grown in.
___host_organism.title: Host organism

___antigen_sequence.description: The amino acid sequence of the antigen.
___antigen_sequence.title: Antigen sequence

___purifications.description: The purification protocols used to isolate the antibody.
___purifications.title: Purification methods

items.description: A purification protocol used to isolate the antibody.
items.comment: IMAC refers to Immobilized Metal Chelate Chromatography and IEC refers to Ion Exchange Chromatography
items.title: Purification method

___alternate_accessions.description: Accessions previously assigned to objects that have been merged with this object.
___alternate_accessions.comment: Do not submit. Only admins are allowed to set or update this value.
___alternate_accessions.title: Alternate accessions

items.description: An accession previously assigned to an object that has been merged with this object.
items.comment: Only accessions of objects that have status equal replaced will work here.
items.title: Alternate Accession

___antigen_description.description: The plain text description of the antigen used in raising the antibody (e.g. amino acid residue locations of the antigen).
___antigen_description.title: Antigen description
